thread.section_title: Mercure London Bridge - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Work Visit
thread.title_full: Work Visit - Review of Mercure London Bridge, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: meggymoo28
title: Work Visit
text: Stayed here briefly with work, what struck me was how lovely the lobby was set out and really the hub of the hotel. The hotel is very clean with a lovely ambiance and the rooms are stunning. I visited the gym which was adequate (they're never amazing) and had a lovely nice sleep in a very stylish hotel.
